security: Disclosing that NIGALE is opposed to passing information to members of the House of Representatives Committee could damage relationships.
summary: A message relays that NIGALE is unwilling to provide information on contacts between Vlaamse Militanten Orde (VMO) members and American citizens between 1968 and 1970, and is opposed to sharing quarterly or semi-annual reports with a House of Representatives committee.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET deferred telepouch, originating from Brussels in May 1978, conveys NIGALE's refusal to furnish data regarding interactions between Vlaamse Militanten Orde (VMO) operatives and U.S. citizens during the 1968-1970 period; citing that preparing a report for members of the House of Representatives Committee is 'inopportune,' NIGALE also declines to share its regular reports with said committee.
title: VLAAMSE MILITANTENORDE
